title: 374 - Daniele Bolelli (Badass Historian)
description:
Daniele Bolelli is a writer, martial artist, university professor, and podcaster. He was born in Italy and currently lives in Los Angeles.

This episode is sponsored by Mud/Wtr and SC Medicinals.

Find me on Instagram or Twitter.

Please consider supporting this podcast on Patreon.

This Amazon affiliate link kicks a few bucks back my way.

Music: “Brightside of the Sun,” by Basin and Range; “If 6 was 9,” by Axiom Funk; “Smoke Alarm,” by Carsie Blanton.



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
